qas.question: How many local newspapers does the island have?
Since when has the St Helena Independent been published?
When was the Sentinel Newspaper introduced?

context: The island has <a0_0>two<a0_0/> local newspapers, both of which are available on <a1_0>the Internet<a1_0/>. The St Helena Independent has been published since <a2_0>November 2005<a2_0/>. The Sentinel newspaper was introduced in <a3_0>2012<a3_0/>.
